Package it.polimi.ingsw.modello

Interface CommonGoalCards

All Superinterfaces:
Serializable
All Known Implementing Classes:
Col2G, Col3G, CornersCommG, Diagonal5CardG, DoubleCommG, EightEqualsCards, Line2G, Line4G, Same4GroupsG, Square2G, StairsGoalCard, XGoalCard
public interface CommonGoalCards extends Serializable
this interface is used to override check(),expired(),getImage() for each CommonGoal card
